name: frgr0vb
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cfrgr))

stmt.origin: biimp3ar(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cfrgr))
stmt.pretty: biimp3ar(c0 ∈ c1, (Vtx ` c0)= ∅, (iEdg ` c0)= ∅, c0 ∈ FriendGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cfrgr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), emptycls)), wb(wcel(c0, cfrgr), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(Vtx ` c0)= ∅ ∧(iEdg ` c0)= ∅)→ c0 ∈ FriendGraph)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(Vtx ` c0)= ∅)→(c0 ∈ FriendGraph ↔(iEdg ` c0)= ∅))

comment: Any null graph (without vertices and edges) is a friendship graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Sep-2017.) (Revised by AV, 29-Mar-2021.)
